tool_description: Queries comprehensive bird species database using multiple identification criteria to generate ranked candidate species lists.

max_results.description: Maximum number of species to return

error_messages: No search criteria provided: Include at least one identification parameter.
Invalid max_results: Must be integer between 1 and 100.
Invalid confidence_threshold: Must be number between 0 and 100.
Database connection failed: Unable to access species database.
Too many features: Limit visual_features and behavioral_traits to 20 items each.
usage: Provide any combination of identification criteria from other tools. Set max_results and confidence_threshold as needed. Returns ranked list of candidate species.

candidate_species.description: Ranked list of potential species matches

total_matches.description: Total number of species found above threshold

search_criteria_used.description: Which criteria were applied in the search
